overview:
Sriram is an associate at SEP, specialising in medical device companies.

Before joining SEP he spent five years working for Medtronic, one of the worldâ€™s leading medical technology companies, based in Minnesota. Sriram worked for the companyâ€™s Cardiac Rhythm Management division where he was responsible for the design and development of next generation pacemakers and defibrillators used for treatment of heart failure. He was also involved in leading a pivotal clinical study in Europe which gave him an understanding of the issues involved in launching products in both US and European markets.
